movie.title: The Disaster Artist
movie.plot: When Greg Sestero, an aspiring film actor, meets the weird and mysterious Tommy Wiseau in an acting class, they form a unique friendship and travel to Hollywood to make their dreams come true.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 31 wins & 81 nominations.
